passages.text:
Did you stop working due to COVID-19?

[[Yes->question-why-stop-working]]
[[No->question-your-situation]]
passages.name: question-lost-job-c19

passages.text:
Why did you stop working?
[[You’ve been laid off due to COVID-19.->question-applied-to-EI]]
[[Your employer has closed.->question-applied-to-EI]]
[[You’re self-employed and had to close.->question-applied-to-EI]]
[[You’re on unpaid leave from your work.->question-applied-to-EI]]
[[You quit or were let go due to unsafe working conditions related to COVID-19.->result-ei-regular]]
[[None of the above.->question-your-situation]]

links.name: You’ve been laid off due to COVID-19.
You’re self-employed and had to close.
You’re on unpaid leave from your work.
You quit or were let go due to unsafe working conditions related to COVID-19.

passages.name: question-why-stop-working

passages.text:
Your situation

[[You were on parental leave recently, but you cannot return to work.->result-cerb]]
[[question-applied-to-EI<-You were supposed to start a new job, but couldn’t due to COVID-19.]]
[[You’re working fewer hours than you were before COVID-19.->result-ccb-and-gst]]
[[You’re working from home.->result-ccb-and-gst]]
[[You’re on paid leave from work.->result-ccb-and-gst]]
[[You have not done any paid work in the last 12 months.->result-ccb-and-gst]]
[[You’re retired.->result-ccb-and-gst]]

links.name: You were on parental leave recently, but you cannot return to work.
